Address.label: Address
Address.value: 100 CENTURYLINK DRIVE, MONROE, Louisiana, 71203, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Lumen Technologies is one of the United States' largest telecommunications carriers serving global enterprises. Its merger with Level 3 further shifted the company's operations toward businesses (over 70% of revenue) and away from its legacy consumer business. Lumen offers businesses a full menu of communications services, providing colocation and data center services, data transportation, and end-user phone and internet service. On the consumer side, Lumen provides broadband and phone service across 37 states, where it has 4.5 million broadband customers.
